## Source: amazon-inspector (96af5d4cffbd1a2bb13ecd403b9acf5e0fe62f6df151c6b511f556c9c0a11c31)
The package wishlist_dropdown was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (540617ab5b0a7271f01ad4fca3eb1988a4c266992332ef26bde224f864929043)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'wishlist_dropdown' @ 97.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
